citeinfo.title: GeoSpecies data

citeinfo.origin: Please refer to Dataset Point of Contact.
citeinfo.title: Please refer to the Projects table in the Landscape Data Commons database.

descript.abstract: This dataset includes plot level plant species indicators including occurrence (from Species inventory), cover (from Line-point intercept), height (from Vegetation height). Reference(s): Herrick, J.E., J. Van Zee, S.E. McCord, J.W. Karl, E. Courtright, and L. Burkett. 2018. The Monitoring Manual for Grassland, Shrubland, and Savanna Ecosystems. USDA-ARS.
descript.purpose: This dataset should be used to determine plant species occurrence, cover, and height within a given plot.

procstep.procdesc: Indicators calculated using the terradactyl R package. https://github.com/Landscape-Data-Commons/terradactyl.

distinfo.distliab: The Landscape Data Commons is freely available for use by the public. Although all reasonable efforts have been taken to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the software and data, the ARS and the U.S. Government do not and cannot warrant the performance or results that may be obtained by their use.
